title: The best hotels in films
text:
Previous slide Next slide 1 of 20 View All Skip Ad 
La La Land Romantic musical and hotly tipped Oscar 2017 contender La La Land follows actress Mia (Emma Stone) and jazz pianist Sebastian's (Ryan Gosling) quest for stardom in their respective fields. After dancing and singing their way around Los Angeles , the film reaches its conclusion years later in a jazz bar in the city. Now a well-known actress, Mia's hotel of choice is, naturally, the Chateau Marmont . The hotel, in real life, is the base of choice for those on the silver screen â€“ everyone from James Dean to Lindsay Lohan has been spied staying there.
